PatentsView-Evaluation’s documentation#

PatentsView-Evaluation is a Python package for the evaluation and benchmarking of PatentsView disambiguation algorithms.

To get started, please refer to the README, the examples page, or the API documentation. Use the project’s Discussion page to ask questions and the Issues page to request features and report bugs.

🚀 README

Get started with an overview of the package, installation instructions, and more.

🤔 Key Concepts

Review key concepts used throughout the package.

🧑‍💻 Examples

Follow through reproducible examples of the package’s functionality.

🗃️ API Doc

Access detailed documentation for all modules and functions.
